c74object.name: seq.clock~

attribute.name: transportstate
attribute.digest: Turns the phasor on or off

attribute.name: barlength
attribute.digest: Number of beats per phasor ramp.

c74object.description: seq.clock~ is similar to the phasor~ object, but has a dedicated transport control and accepts timing values in beats per minute. Unlike seq.bar~, seq.clock~ allows you to change the clock speed using a signal.
c74object.digest: Generate sawtooth signals in beats per minute.
